ComicInfo.Summary: After mounting a successful counter attack against the ravenous onslaught of bloodthirsty carnivores, Meriem receives a note. The gang that damaged the fence and let the creatures into town have now kidnapped Bruce. They are blaming her for interfering and demand she leave the town of Marshville forever, or Bruce will die.
